name: avandria
description: Avandria - A Browser-Based Text RPG built with the MERN stack

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix server && npm run lint:fix --prefix client
scripts.format: prettier --write . && npm run format --prefix server && npm run format --prefix client
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && npm run format:check --prefix server && npm run format:check --prefix client
